title: Kim Kardashian says Paris Hilton 'gave me a career' as she reunites with old friend
text:
Kim Kardashian's public profile long ago eclipsed that of her old pal, Paris Hilton.

But there was a time when Paris was the famous one, and Kim just her hanger on.

The Keeping Up With the Kardashian's star remembered those days affectionately on Sunday's episode of the show, as she reminisced about how Paris launched her on the road to reality stardom.

Together again: Kim Kardashian says Paris Hilton 'gave me a career' as she reunites with old friend on music video set on Sunday's Keeping Up With The Kardashians

As they were: Kim is seen with Paris back in 2010

Her memories were sparked Paris, 38, asked her to be in the music video for her new song, Best Friend's A**, to be shot within the next few days.

At the shoot, Paris was overjoyed to see Kim, calling her 'the ultimate' and noting that 'the song was inspired by you and your little f***ing a**.'

Paris then complained that her spray tan had turned her hairline orange.

'Do you know that I never even knew what a spray tan was until I met you?' Kim asked.

Catching up: The two friends chat on the video set

Filming: Kim filmed a music video for Paris Hilton's song Best Friend's Ass

'Hanging out with Paris is like literally stepping into 2007,' she said privately. 'She looks exactly the same.'

Kim agreed to the shoot despite being busy, saying: 'It'll be such a fun tribute to the good old days.'

Kanye listened to the song and pronounced it 'fire.'

'I really would want to do anything for her,' Kim told Khloé. 'She literally gave me a career.'

Kim explained that she'd never traveled the world until she met Paris, but that they 'went on so many trips together, from Germany to Australia to Ibiza.'

'I learned a lot from her, and I'm glad that I had that as an example,' Kim explained.

Career start: Khloe listened as Kim gave Paris credit for her career
description: Kim Kardashian's public profile long ago eclipsed that of her old pal, Paris Hilton.
